name: gov-row-grid
label: 左图右文宫格
codeSnap:
<view>
    <gov-row-grid
        list="{{[{
            icon,
            title: '语文'
        },
        {
            icon,
            title: '数学'
        },
        {
            icon,
            title: '英语'
        }]}}"
        column-num="3">
    </gov-row-grid>
</view>

demoCode.s:
<view>
    <view class="preview-caption">默认效果</view>
    <gov-row-grid
        list="{{listHasLine}}">
    </gov-row-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">有竖分割线</view>
    <gov-row-grid
        list="{{listHasLine}}"
        column-num="3"
        binditemclick="bindItemClick">
    </gov-row-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">无竖分割线</view>
    <gov-row-grid
        list="{{listHasLine}}"
        column-num="3"
        has-line="{{false}}"
        binditemclick="bindItemClick">
    </gov-row-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">有横分割线</view>
    <gov-row-grid
        list="{{listThree}}"
        column-num="3"
        binditemclick="bindItemClick">
    </gov-row-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">无横分割线</view>
    <gov-row-grid
        list="{{listThree}}"
        column-num="3"
        has-line="{{false}}"
        binditemclick="bindItemClick">
    </gov-row-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">无点击态</view>
    <gov-row-grid
        list="{{listHasLine}}"
        column-num="3"
        has-line="{{false}}"
        has-hover="{{false}}"
        binditemclick="onItemClick">
    </gov-row-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">文本超过显示省略号</view>
    <gov-row-grid
        list="{{listMore}}"
        border-radius="50"
        column-num="3"
        has-line="{{false}}"
        binditemclick="bindItemClick">
    </gov-row-grid>
    <view class="preview-caption">自定义样式宫格</view>
    <gov-row-grid
        gov-title="gov-title"
        gov-image-class="gov-image-class"
        list="{{listThree}}"
        border-radius="50"
        has-border="{{false}}"
        column-num="3"
        has-hover="{{false}}"
        has-line="{{false}}"
        binditemclick="bindItemClick">
    </gov-row-grid>
</view>

attributes.name: has-line
attributes.description: 是否有竖分隔线，默认有

attributes.name: binditemclick
attributes.description: 点击宫格每一项的事件

events.name: itemclick
events.description: 点击宫格每一项的事件, 可以通过e事件对象, e.detail.index获取到每一项的索引值

externalClasses.name: gov-grid-item
externalClasses.description: 整体宫格外层的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变其的样式，如内边距

externalClasses.name: gov-inner-grid-item
externalClasses.description: （图片+标题）的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变其的样式，如背景色

externalClasses.name: gov-title
externalClasses.description: 标题title的扩展样式类，可以通过此class改变其外层的样式，如设置字大小：font-size: 60px

externalClasses.name: gov-image-class
externalClasses.description: 当设置hasBoder=false时,左边图片的扩展样式，可通过此class改变其外部的样式，如设置宽度：width: 25px
